Traits.Name: Living Lightning
Traits.Description: Electrifies foes it moves through. Foes that are already electrified take 2 damage, but only the first time on a turn. Allied spaces cost 0 movement to pass through.

Actions.Name: Soul Shift
Actions.Description: The Ghul and any adjacent relict teleport 3. When they reappear, they must be placed adjacent if possible.
